p: Tested oils were inserted into a PDA medium (Potato Dextrose Agar produced by BioMaxima S.A., Lublin, Poland) enriched with 0.01% Tween 80 (produced by BTL, Warsaw, Poland) in the following concentrations: 0.125; 0.25; 0.5; 1.0; 2.0%. The control was carried out through the growth of tested isolates in modified PDA medium (without oils).
